name: Package.Dependency
desc: A package dependency of a Swift package.

items.name: static func package(url: String, from: Version) -> Package.Dependency
items.desc: Adds a package dependency that uses the version requirement, starting with the given minimum version, going up to the next major version.

items.name: static func package(url: String, Range<Version>) -> Package.Dependency
items.desc: Adds a package dependency starting with a specific minimum version, up to but not including a specified maximum version.

items.name: static func package(url: String, ClosedRange<Version>) -> Package.Dependency
items.desc: Adds a package dependency starting with a specific minimum version, going up to and including a specific maximum version.

items.name: static func package(path: String) -> Package.Dependency
items.desc: Adds a dependency to a local package on the filesystem.

items.name: struct Version
items.desc: A version according to the semantic versioning specification.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

items.name: static func package(name: String, path: String) -> Package.Dependency
static func package(url: String, branch: String) -> Package.Dependency
static func package(url: String, exact: Version) -> Package.Dependency
static func package(url: String, revision: String) -> Package.Dependency
